about_the_game:
A brand new premium handbook to celebrate the Reforged edition of the game. The perfect digital companion guide packed with useful information, developer insights and bonus history.

Includes

  • Travel Guide: discover the real world inspirations for key locations in the game, and plan your own adventure across Paris and Europe!

  • Original Prologue: introductory story recovered from the 1996 manual.

  • Character Biographies: profile gallery of memorable characters in the game.

  • Development History: from concept to cover art, and the team behind it all.

  • Game Help: controls reference, accessibility features and gameplay tips.

  • Savage Warriors: booklet tracing the remarkable story of the real Knights Templar (available in English, French and German).
